intro.subtitle: Full Stack Software Engineer
intro.bio: At the age of 8, I searched “how to hack” on Google. This led me to discover the world of computer science and programming beginning with C, then later C++ and beyond. This allowed me to hone my skills with algorithms and object-oriented programming from a very young age. From then on, I have continued to follow this childhood dream, which has now become a full-fledged passion.

ludonope.description: A responsive, multilingual and animated website that I created with with Vue.js, Typescript and knowledge.

blt.description: Beach Launch Team is a liquid-fueled rocketry club at California State University Long Beach. I developed a live vehicle tajectory visualization software using Cesium.js. I also participated to a static fire and launch attempt for the FAR-Mars competition. Moreover, that experience allowed me to meet incredible people there.

rematch.description: Rematch is an app which allows you to easily capture the best moments of amateur sport. I lead the setup of a new backend using AWS (Lambda, API Gateway, Cognito, EC2) and Go. I also guided the setup of the new frontend in Vue.js and deployment on AWS (S3, Cloudfront).

manacore.description: Manacore is a powerful modular ERP SaaS that provides your company with a collection of easy to use services, 100% customizable. It uses the AWS ecosystem (Lambda, API Gateway, Cognito, Cloudfront, S3, SNS, SQS) and a homemade module system in Vue.js. This is my senior project with 5 other Epitech students. It is developed in partnership with the "Association des Paralysés de France" (French association for paralyzed individuals)
